abstract: Editorial urges Pennsylvania Legislature to pass proposed law that would end the state's death penalty; holds that latest analysis of Pennsylvania's capital cases shows a failure of justice and vivid proof that the death penalty cannot meet constitutional standards.
snippet: The facts in Pennsylvania’s death penalty cases show an abysmal failure of justice and a convincing argument to end the barbaric punishment.
lead_paragraph: The facts in Pennsylvania’s death penalty cases show an abysmal failure of justice and a convincing argument to end the barbaric punishment.
